column1: ''I am not (denial of the speaker's identity)''  –  '''mi'e nai'''
''I have no idea! (lack of certainty)''  –  '''ju'o nai'''
''better''  –  '''zmadu fi lo ka xamgu''', '''se mau xau'''
''competent''  –  '''lo kakne''', '''lo certu, lo kakne, lo certu'''
''<small>to</small> concern (to be on mind of)''  –  '''se pensi'''
''delight (happiness)''  –  '''lo ka mutce lo ka gleki''', '''lo ka gleki'''
''from center of ... and of distance ... around''  –  '''mi'i'''
''life''  –  '''lo nu jmive''', '''lo nu renvi, lo se renvi'''
''<small>to</small> mark (to put a mark)''  –  '''jmina lo barna''', '''jai gau barna'''
''over and out (at the end of discussion)''  –  '''fe'o'''
''possibly can and at least once actually is or does ...''  –  '''pu'i'''
''<small>expected</small> profit of an investment''  –  '''lo ve zivle'''
''that's all I can say (in radio communications)''  –  '''mu'o'''
